name: Hatsubai 1 Shuunen: 3DO REAL: Tokubetsu Premium CD
overview: Collection of demos of games playable 7: Starblade, Road Rash, Shock Wave , Masters Harukanaru Augusta 3, Flopon Kun 3/2 (neat disc was not, enters the collection Furopon World), Alone in the Dark , Street Fighter II Turbo. The disc is very rare.
